summary: Upon moving into a bigoted neighborhood, the scientist father of a persecuted black family gives a superpower elixir to a tough bodyguard, who thus becomes a superpowered crimefighter.
cast: J. Walter Smith|Tobar Mayo|Roxie Young|Gladys Lum|Tony Rumford|Rupert Williams|Tina James|Art Jackson|Allen Ogle|Joe Alberti|Dee Turguand|Nelson Meeker|William Carrol Jr.|James Dickson|Richard Corrigan|Fred D. Scott|Chuck Cumminsky|Syd Marks|Edward Cross|April London|Cal Williams|Keith Gill|Sugar McNair|Lee Dodson|Frank Doubleday|Felicia Cruse|Manuel Angeli|Charles Green|Odell Mack|John Kerry
keywords: black superhero|blaxploitation|non comic book superhero|supernatural power|elixir
title: Abar
